Interface IpmiEncoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProtocolEncoder, Protocolv15Encoder, Protocolv20Encoder

    public interface IpmiEncoder
    Encodes IPMI message.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] encode(IpmiMessage ipmiMessage)
      Encodes IPMI message.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        byte[] encode(IpmiMessage ipmiMessage)
              throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Encodes IPMI message.
        Parameters:
        ipmiMessage - - IPMI message to encode.
        Returns:
        IPMI message encoded into byte array.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - - when initiation of the confidentiality algorithm fails
        See Also:
        IpmiMessage
